text: A statue of Mickey Mantle is installed Commerce, Oklahoma, United States. ==See also== * Statue of Mickey Mantle (Oklahoma City) ==References== Category:Monuments and memorials in Oklahoma Category:Outdoor sculptures in Oklahoma Category:Sculptures of men in Oklahoma Category:Statues in Oklahoma Category:Statues of sportspeople Category:Cultural depictions of baseball players Category:Cultural depictions of American men
title: Statue of Mickey Mantle (Commerce, Oklahoma)
